participant_1.background:
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.
i like dogs.
I like to have a place where I can fully immerse myself in my fantasy world.
My most valued material possession is my stethoscope

participant_2.background:
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking!
My favorite people are my friends who I can drink coffee with and talk about anything.
My longest relationship was with my dog Collie, but he passed away a few years ago.
i work at a daycare.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm excited to be learning about new music theory today. What are you learning about in school?
I'm learning about how to take care of children at my daycare job. It's really interesting, but also challenging!
I bet it is! I have a lot of respect for people who work with kids. I'm not sure I could handle it!
It's definitely not for everyone, but it's really rewarding when you see how much you can help kids learn and grow.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I'm going to go grab some coffee with my friends now. It was nice talking to you!
It was nice talking to you too! Have a good time with your friends!
